Icônes

Accessible SVG Icons with Inline Sprites.


<svg role="img" class="c-icon c-icons" focusable="false" aria-hidden="true">

<title class="u-sr-only">Menu</title>

<use xlink:href="/assets/icons/sprite/icons.svg#menu"></use>
</svg>
